item.title: Report X-2025020366
item.description:
Report X-2025020366

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-05
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING AIR PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWELVE FLAMMABLE CANS OF RAINBOW ZINC COLD GALVANIZE AEROSOLS, EACH AT 14 OZ. ONE CAN LEAKED DUE TO A RUPTURE IN THE BOTTOM SEAM OF THE CAN. OUTER BOX IS UN SPECIFICATION PACKAGING WITH TWO WHITE AVERY LABELS DESCRIBING THE PRODUCT INCLUDING SMALL LETTERING OF A PARTIAL PROPER SHIPPING NAME, AEROSOL CANS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS SHIPPING PAPERS, MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.
